function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Abandonment of global malaria eradication programs","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate political support for eradication campaigns","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cross-border invasion of ae. aegypti","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Abandonment of environmental management practices like drainage of marshes and housing improvements","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced funding and lack of community participation","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of sub-saharan africa from global malaria eradication programme","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Colonial expansion in ssa and massive outbreaks of hat","category":"Leadership","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Neglect of neglected tropical diseases ntds","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service encounters as a focal element in service provision","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic response leading to increased disease spread","category":"Organization","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased popularity of food trucks leading to higher consumer exposure to different cuisines","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant decline in sales and workforce layoffs in the restaurant and food services industry due to covid-19 outbreak","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased uncertainty and risks associated with dining out due to covid-19","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited ability and willingness of consumers to continue social dining experiences","category":"Customer","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspected ’greenwashing’ in ecotourism","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of transparency in product and service production","category":"Business","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unbalanced relationship between human and nature","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks associated with the transmission of zoonotic diseases from amazonian animals to humans, especially in the context of wildlife rehabilitation and conservation programs.","category":"Visitors","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of respect for local traditions and landscape","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of income and control leading to development of illegal activities in the territory","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The high level of uncertainty and unreliability in the availability of unskilled work within the communities","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain long-term toll of coronavirus","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on workforce and economy","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural differences in work environment expectations","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Illegal wildlife trade and captivity practices in the amazon may contribute to the spread of zoonotic diseases and threaten public health.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for human health and well-being in favor of economic recovery may lead to increased risk of public health crises, including contagious diseases.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality in modern society due to emphasis on individualism over community decrees","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to de-densify small premises leading to limited social distancing
